body.name: Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion, Unscented Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 16.9 Fl Oz Pump Bottle

features: 48-HOUR MOISTURE: This Eucerin fragrance free lotion repairs very dry skin and fights dryness at its source by providing 48-hour moisture
CONVENIENT LOTION BOTTLE: Body lotion pump bottle makes it simple to pump and apply anytime
PREVENTS DRYNESS: This Eucerin lotion for dry skin is enriched with Ceramide-3 and Natural Moisturizing Factors to boost moisture and help prevent dryness
FREE OF: Eucerin Advanced Repair lotion is a paraben free body lotion, and is fragrance free, dye free, and is also lightweight, fast-absorbing and non-greasy
INCLUDES: one (1) 16.9 fluid ounce bottle of Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion, Unscented Lotion for Dry Skin
body.description: Fight dryness at its source with Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion. This Eucerin lotion for dry skin provides 48 hour moisture for skin that looks and feels healthy. Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion for dry skin is formulated with ceramides to help strengthen the skin’s moisture barrier to lock in moisture. It is also formulated with Natural Moisturizing Factors, amino acids that are naturally found in the skin, to boost moisture and help prevent dryness. This Eucerin sensitive skin lotion formula is lightweight and fast-absorbing, and smoothes, repairs and hydrates dry skin. This Eucerin body lotion for sensitive dry skin is fragrance free, dye free, paraben free. This body moisturizer can also be used as a hand lotion or foot lotion. To use, smooth this Eucerin dry skin lotion onto your skin daily. For best results, apply after showering. Eucerin is a dermatologist-recommended skincare brand that is based on an uncompromising approach to science. With skin care products designed to restore and sustain healthy-looking skin, families everywhere look to Eucerin to enhance outer beauty and self-confidence.

Can you use this product on your face? The Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Cream has not been specifically tested for use on the face. You may want to try the Eucerin Daily Protection Face Lotion Broad Spectrum SPF 30 which is fragrance-free and won't clog pores. Does this lotion help with cracked skin? This product is not recommended for cracked skin. It's an advanced moisturizing formula that helps very dry, rough, flaky skin maintain its moisture balance. What ingredients are in this body lotion? You can find a full list of the ingredients in Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion on the back of the bottle and in the product images located at the top of this page. How often should I apply this product? Use Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion daily for best results, and apply after showering. Can Eucerin Advanced Repair Lotion be used on your hands or feet? Yes, Eucerin Advanced Repair Body Lotion can be used as both a hand lotion and foot lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lotion rocks
reviews.reviewText: The lotion doesn’t leave your hands or anywhere you apply it slippery. Soaks right in your skin and helps get rid of dry skin fast! Highly recommend. No smell but extremely effective.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best lotion ever
reviews.reviewText: Finally a lotion that actually soaks into my skin. Moisturizing without a greasy feel. I found my new lotion. Absolutely amazing. Highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Tried-and-True Solution for Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: I've used Eucerin lotion for years, and let me tell you, it's been my steadfast companion in the battle against dry skin. As I age, I've noticed my skin becoming even drier, but thankfully, this lotion continues to be an effective solution for me.One of the features I appreciate most about this lotion is how quickly it absorbs. Nobody likes that greasy, sticky feeling after applying lotion, and Eucerin avoids that entirely. It sinks into my skin with ease, leaving it feeling soft and supple, without any residue.Additionally, the fact that this lotion is scent-free is a huge bonus. I don't have to worry about conflicting fragrances with other products or an overpowering scent lingering on my skin. It's a simple and effective moisturizing solution without any unnecessary frills.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great alternative to pricier options
reviews.reviewText: I have very dry skin on my arms and legs, and I’m also battling some crepey skin on my upper arms. This was recommended on YouTube as an affordable alternative to pricier lotions made for crepey skin. I’ve been using it for a few months now and I think my crepey skin is improving! My legs look better too- still a bit dry but I think the skin tone is better- less blotchy. I also use it on my neck and décolletage as an affordable alternative to very expensive neck and chest creams. Only odd thing- it absorbs nicely on my arms and legs but hours later my neck will still feel a bit greasy. But it’s not irritating my skin! And that’s huge for me as I have sensitive skin and prone to the occasional breakout. But do NOT use on face or neck if you plan to put makeup over it. It does not take makeup well at all!

reviews.reviewText: Makes my hands slimy after using then drys sticky, but actually helps my dryness. I just wipe it off after 30 or so minutes.
